SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DateObject
DTO representing calendar/holiday data returned by the external holidays API.
ForecastingStockAvailabilityApplication
Spring Boot entry point and simple test endpoints for the Forecasting Stock Availability service.
HolidayApi
Client for retrieving holiday and calendar data from an external API.
HolidayDataInterface
Abstraction for providing holiday data.
InventoryRecord
MongoDB document representing a daily inventory record for a specific item in a shop.
InventoryRecordsManager
Service layer for managing InventoryRecord entities.
InventoryRecordsRepository
Spring Data MongoDB repository for InventoryRecord documents.
Prediction
REST controller and component that provides stock level predictions based on historical sales and calendar/event features.
SearchItemBean
Request bean specifying inputs for prediction and data window.
ShopDateConfig
Configuration of special event dates for a single shop.
ShopDateConfigLoader
Loads and provides access to shop event date configurations from classpath JSON.
UploadDataEndpoint
REST endpoint for uploading inventory records in bulk as JSON.
WebConfig
Web-related Spring configuration.
